bike.description: A-6 Quaternary phase alloy, custom butted, integrated head tube, top tube/seat tube gusset, down tube gusset, water bottle mount. Rear triangle: A-6 Quaternary phase alloy, custom butted w/ Four Bar linkage system 100m travel, Cold forged dropout with CNC'D disc mount and replaceable hanger, Sealed bearing pivots

NEW Shimano XTR Exterior Cartridge Bearing System
Ritchey Logic Zero Pro 1 1/8" Press Fit Integrated, 30mm spacers
Syncros Factory Gian CF Carbon Riser
Rock Shox Reba Team 32mm stanchions, Alloy steerer 80mm travel w/ Motion Control and PopLoc remote
Rock Shox MC 3.3 w/Motion Control and 3 position Switch Floodgate
NEW Shimano XTR Dual Control Shifter/Hydraulic Brake Lever 27-speed
WTB Devo Team Ti w/ Ti rails & DNA padding
